SHARPE offers not only ballistic backpacks but also other bullet - resistant products such as ballistic helmets , vests and shields ; electroshock products such as stun guns and stun batons ; personal pepper spray with or without the alarm function .
They offer OEM / ODM services of these kinds of products to clients as a preferred cooperation model .
SHARPE is a brand created in 2013 by two companies , Yungyi International Merchandise Co. , Ltd. and Global Merchandise Link Inc .
Before SHARPE was created , Yungyi Int'l 's general manager Michael Wang has been studying and working on related fields for more than 2 years .
